name: TrashDash
description:
TrashDash was a project aimed at educating a young demographic of children to teenagers the importance of throwing away various items of trash to its appropriate bin. Developed by a group of university students back in 2019, the game uses top down click to move coupled with a sorting system filled with interesting facts and tips to highlight the importance of sustainability.

Features:
  • Sorting Gameplay
  • Educational Facts
Contributing members:
  • Ethan Dempsey
  • Janine Ibali
  • Johnny La
  • Nathaniel Saddam
  • Matt Kummerehl
  • William Sevens
Special Thanks:
  • Griffith University Staff
